snippet.title: Tormented Soul PvP Official Steam Trailer—11/15.
snippet.description:
High Stakes PvPvE—blending MOBA, Sandbox, and MMO progression elements. AOE skill based action combat, seasonal gear progression, loadouts, seamless combat-gathering, partial loot PvP—item corruption & cleansing system, and risk-boosted RNG. Ascend 51 ranks—become a Time Slayer.

The game is being made in Unreal Engine 5 by 2 brothers.

Steam Launch Nov 15th!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3269360/Tormented_Soul/

Purchase our game on the Epic Game Store now! https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/tormented-soul-4793a8

Join our discord! https://discord.com/invite/RtyCEPC7uX
